actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill entitled the "Fair Treatment for Skilled Trades Act of 1978".

summary.text: Amends the National Labor Relations Act with respect to the authority of the National Labor Relations Board to decide that a craft unit is an inappropriate collective bargaining unit to require such a decision to be based upon collective bargaining history or decided in the same manner as the initial establishment of such a unit would be.

titles.title: A bill entitled the "Fair Treatment for Skilled Trades Act of 1978".
